about_the_game: Under the Waves OST is a 21-track piece of art composed by Nicolas Bredin, influenced by Icelandic composers such as Valgeir Sigurdsson and Ólafur Arnalds, as well as post-rock bands like Mogwai, Sigur Ros and Radiohead. This ambient soundtrack perfectly illustrates the game's characters and atmosphere through a medidative and melancholic soundscape. Plus it plays with the ambiguity of the characters by frequently switching from major to minor.
